text: Lars Troels Jørgensen (born 3 February 1978) is a Danish retired handball player. He used to play for the Danish national team and the Spanish club SDC San Antonio. Lastly he played for the Danish club KIF Kolding København. He is European Champion by winning the 2008 European Men's Handball Championship with the Danish national handball team. ==References== ==External links== *Official homepage Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Denmark Category:Handball players at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:SDC San Antonio players
title: Lars T. Jørgensen
